Class ReviewerRequestsTest

java.lang.Object
database.BaseDatabaseTest
database.tests.ReviewerRequestsTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class ReviewerRequestsTest extends BaseDatabaseTest
Unit tests for the ReviewerRequests repository.

This test class verifies various operations performed on the ReviewerRequests repository, including creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, and filtering by user or instructor.

It interacts with the Users repository to ensure user relationships are properly established before conducting reviewer request-related tests.

Author:
Dhruv
